item.title: The 5 Most Common REST API Design Mistakes (and How to Avoid Them)
item.description: Five REST API design mistakes I see all the time, with practical fixes. Use consistent resource naming, evolve contracts instead of bumping versions, add envelopes, pagination and filtering, return Problem Details, and bake in auth, authz, and rate limits from day one. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/the-5-most-common-rest-api-design-mistakes-and-how-to-avoid-them
